column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I ordered the takoyaki
column3: and shared the veggie ramen with a friend. The takoyaki was delicious and almost too filling
column4: as there were 6 to an order. The texture
column7: and appearance all met my expectations of a hot fried ball of octopus goodness
column8: with a bit of mayo and bonito flakes on top.  The veggie ramen was good and healthy with lots of vegetables
column9: though I am sure ordering the Tonkotsu would be tastier. (I'm a pork fan.)  I would go back here.
